amendment.description: To enhance border security by creating a pilot SAFE Visa Program to grant visas to authorized nationals of a NAFTA or CAFTA-DR country who receive employment offers in job areas in the United States that have been certified by the Secretary of Labor as having a shortage of workers.

action.text: Amendment SA 4101 proposed by Senator Hutchison.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4101 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 67. Record Vote Number: 148.
